messages.content: Hi there, thank you for contacting Nestlé customer service. My name is Curie. May I know your name, please?
It's David. I'm not happy with your product, Purina Pro Plan.
I'm sorry to hear that, David. Could you please tell me more about the issue you're experiencing?
The last batch I bought was damaged. The cans were dented and some even had leaks. This is unacceptable!
I apologize for the inconvenience, David. That certainly doesn't meet our quality standards. Can you provide the batch number and some photos of the damaged cans?
I don’t have time to take pictures. The batch number is 123456. I just want this resolved quickly.
Thank you for providing the batch number. I'll escalate this issue to our quality control team immediately. In the meantime, can I offer you a replacement or a refund?
A refund would be better. I don’t trust that another batch won’t have the same problem.
I understand, David. I'll process the refund right away. You should see the amount credited back to your account within 5-7 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, just make sure it gets done. Thanks.
Absolutely, David. I assure you it will be taken care of promptly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
